oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Church of God of Prophecy, 2001 November
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of the Church of God of Prophecy located at 1105 Fifty-first Avenue North, Nashville, Tennessee. According to the Sacred Sites Survey form, this church was built in 1950. The address stops appearing in the Nashville City Directories in the 1990s. The foundation is brick. The exterior walls are brick. The roof is gabled and hipped with tar shingles. The windows are square shaped with colored glass panes. The doors are metal. Forms part of the Historic Nashville, Inc. Sacred Sites Survey Project. 1 photograph : col. ; 4 x 6 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Church of God of Prophecy (Nashville, Tenn.)
